page.title: 15COUNTRY LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Country people on the whole have the same sort of leisure activities as town people,but some of them are quite different & unusual. GROUSE BEATING:The function of the the grouse beater is to flush out the birds on the moor for the men with guns to shoot them.They space themselves out across the moor & at a given signal begin to walk in line waving white flags & making as much noise as possible.When the birds begin to fly they try to direct them towards the guns. HANDBELL RINGING:This is a popular activity & a group meets every week to practise.They play hymns,carols,folk & popular classics at the annual Garden Party,in the Shopping Precinct at Christmas & around the local pubs to raise money.
